inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: ultrasound revealed several gallstones, biliary sludge and CBD stones

inclusion.criterion: Pain/sensitivity >5 on NRS scale in symphysis pubis area for more than two weeks
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: epigastric pain radiates to the right upper quadrant, getting worse after eating fatty food

exclusion.criterion: Lack of proficiency in Hebrew or English
exclusion.label: unknown
not_met
exclusion.evidence: epigastric pain radiates to the right upper quadrant

exclusion.criterion: Pelvic bone disease or history of severe pelvic bone injury
exclusion.label: unknown
not_met
